targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("Percent_Idle_Time") FROM "win_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$_host$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$_environment$/ AND "category" =~ /^$_role$/ AND "os" = 'windows') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($_bucket), "host" fill(null)

SELECT MAX( "utilization") FROM ( SELECT "HeapMemoryUsage.used" / "HeapMemoryUsage.max" AS "utilization" FROM "jvm_memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$_host$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$_environment$/ AND "category" =~ /^$_role$/) AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($_bucket), "host" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jvm_memory" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "category"=~/build.*/
list.label: Host
list.name: _host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jvm_memory" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "category"=~/build.*/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jvm_memory" WITH KEY = "category" WHERE "category"=~/build.*/
list.label: Role
list.name: _role
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jvm_memory" WITH KEY = "category" WHERE "category"=~/build.*/
